item.title: Designing the Infrastructure of My Future Home
item.description: What do I need and what do I want? Needs are adjusted for a modern human. Needs safeness from other people, animals and weather conditions (cold, heat, rain, wind) stability of air humidity and purity and room temperature source of drinkable water source of harmless water for cleaning and washing source of heat for heating and cooking food sources of light calm and private space for all residents food storage cleaning and housekeeping tools health harmlessnes of used materials Wants I took inspiration [[forest/Features of My Future Home|here]].

item.description: I basically want to become Entrepreneur-Athlete-Scientist (EAS, read “ass”), because I deeply admire them and their characteristics and traits. I want to be like them.

item.title: Entrepreneurship
item.description: I don’t see any other career path or path of life (think monk-way-of-life or becoming full-time dad) than becoming entrepreneur. Heck, I wouldn’t like to be solely a [[forest/Entrepreneur-Athlete-Scientist Trio|scientist or athlete]].

item.title: Investment Guidelines 2022
item.description: 2022-08-03 10:00 This little writing will contain my guidelines for investing in 2022 and forward. I will summarize here my goals and intentions of investing. And from that point of knowing where I want to go, I will try to find the optimal way(s) of getting there.

item.title: Quartz-Forest
item.description: Proposal It would be so cool, to be able to navigate through Obsidian or Quartz not on 2D plane graph, but in 3D generated space with paths. You would really feel like on a visit in someones magical forest - ready to be explored.

item.title: The War on Content
item.description: The War on Content I declared war on the internet content and some other distracting activities. Why would you even… I feel like I can be kept in distraction led life, without really ever moving anywhere.

item.title: We don't lose 2% of our money when there is 2% inflation
item.description: TLDR We lose only 1,960784% of our money when there is 2% inflation. What is money, what is inflation and why should I care? I like to see money as a medium of economic energy transfer.

item.title: Where to Put My Money
item.description: Invest only in things that you care about. Invest because you want to support the cause, not because it will bring you more money. Making more money is useful though, for you can increase your ability to do good and increase your ability to support good causes.

item.title: New Approach To Composing Obsidian Knowledge Base
item.description: It should be more like an exploration - a forest, a huge garden full of surprises, often to be (re-)explored, (re-)navigated, (re-)connected. With a few well known paths and singposts (word for today - signpost - tables with directions), so entities do not get completely lost.

item.title: Investment Form
item.description: I, (name), want to invest my (money/time) into (cause) because (reason). I have enough reserves and/or the risk of loss to possible gain is adequate and well considered. I studied the cause well enough to make this rational decision.

item.title: 12 Factor Apps
item.description: An app‚Äôs¬†config¬†is everything that is likely to vary between¬†deploys A¬†deploy¬†of the twelve-factor app should be able to swap out a local MySQL database with one managed by a third party (such as¬†Amazon RDS) without any changes to the app‚Äôs code… only the resource handle in the config needs to change.

item.title: Exchange Traded Fund
item.description: Exchange Traded Fund correlations - how does different markets react to each other (gold to stocks, stocks to oil, oil to real estate) do not invest in one segment at the same time - choose them in time, so you always win overlaps ETFs are not free, they have their own management price

item.title: How to Write Book Summary
item.description: The Goal The goal of my personal book summary is to connect and embed the thoughts presented in the book into my personal active knowledge. Insert it into my internal structuralization.

item.title: Man's Search for Meaning
item.description: Man’s Search For Meaning Viktor E. Frankl Written by Viktor Emil Frankl (1905-1997), who was a Viennese neurologist, psychiatrist and founder and propagator of Logotherapy. Logotherapy is a school of psychology, with focus on the future and discovering man’s life purpose, which Frankl claims is essential and a pure need of a man and needs to be fulfilled.

item.title: Sleep Better Tips
item.description: clean up in your head, organize the next day and end the current one, clean up the white board take a few (at least 6) deep breaths to calm yourself down always go to sleep at the same time every day, including weekend workout, take cold showers and eat with a time buffer (if i go to sleep at 23:00, try to avoid these activities from 20:00 or so) naps through-out the day no longer than 30mins.
